# duplocloud_plan_kms (Data Source)

`duplocloud_plan_kms` retrieves details of a specific kms for a given plan.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `plan_id` (String) The plan ID

### Read-Only

- `arn` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
